E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 2/8/1989
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Thomas Evans, LF Ward Maul
in return for
CF Hans Mackenzie.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Mark Mitchell
Dear Sir,
Mark Mitchell is doing pretty good at AA Cordan Crows!
He has an ERA of 1.69, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Craig Mahar
Dear Sir,
Craig Mahar has nothing more to prove at A Shalomar Scythes!
He has an AVG of .308 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
